definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

sentences.english: As you may be aware, there is a UK shortage and the waiting lists are very long.
sentences.chinese: 如你所知，英國供應短缺並且有一個很長的輪候名單。

sentences.english: There is a long train of patients at the clinic queuing for treatment.
sentences.chinese: 診所內有一長排病者輪候治療。

sentences.english: Unprecedented numbers of elderly people queued in the early hours yesterday for traditional rice handouts.
sentences.chinese: 昨晨有破紀錄數目的老年人輪候派米。

sentences.english: Will be a separate waitlist for each.
sentences.chinese: 情況，兩種類別將有不同的輪候名單。

definition: public/publicly (owned, financed, operated etc)/run by the state
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
